generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, separated from the road by a curb.
- building: Several buildings are visible along the right side of the road and in the background.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass is visible along the edge of the road and in the median strip.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including the one directly in front of the camera and several others in the adjacent lanes.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, showing red signals.
- traffic sign: A triangular "yield" sign is visible on a pole above the road, and a circular "no entry" sign is partially visible on the left edge of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and traffic signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the distance, behind the cars in the middle of the road.
